body: An establishment for dancing, drinking, and consorting with attractive people. It is often a place where members of different social classes can intermingle discreetly, sometimes using masks or other disguises.
name: Dance Hall
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Buildings And Organizations/Buildings and Organizations/Buildings/Dance Hall
rooms: 1 Ballroom, 1 Bar, 1 Common Room, 1 Lavatory, 1 Office, 1 Sitting Room, 1 Storage
